comments:
[Acceptance]__instanceid doesn't take effect in deployment[0601]
Build number:
2.2.0.v20070601-1347
Steps to reproduce:
1.deploy on tomcat 5.5.7
2.input content below in addressline
http://spm2003:8082/birt20070601/run?__report=sample2.rptdesign&__instanceid=#tableiid
http://spm2003:8082/birt20070601/preview?__report=sample2.rptdesign&__instanceid=#tableiid
Expected result:
table item is displayed
Actual result:
Exception is thrown when using run method
NPE was thrown when using preview method
